lines.text: How much do you know about the death penalty?
Pretty good for poor white trash. How well I'll be accepted after everybody finds out I'm Hitler's daughter is another thing.
We come from a long line of hate.
Save me. Your don't look like you can save a turkey from Thanksgiving.
You're in Mississippi now - land of the secrets. There are bodies buried everywhere.
If you spend half as much time trying to be a lawyer instead of trying to be Dick Tracy, I might not be dead in five days.
